name: Pagaille Mobile
overview:
Pagaille Mobile designs and markets smart mobile gateway solutions to Telco Operators, Service Providers and Fortune 500 Companies. Our solution strategy includes integrating third-party mobile VAS offerings that benefit from our smart platform.

Our initial offering, Obvio, is a smart mobile telephony gateway that features:

Smart voice call routing â€¢ Real-time, context-sensitive routing of incoming voice calls, based on user-selected routing rules and user availabilities, applicable to groups or individual callers. Return call scheduling â€¢ Schedules return-call appointments in the userâ€™s mobile device agenda, based on the userâ€™s availabilities, callerâ€™s profile and associated call routing rules. Mobile data save & restore â€¢ Backs up the userâ€™s mobile device data and call information in a secure hosting facility located in Canada
